LanguageData.HorsePenis.label: equine penis
LanguageData.HorsePenis.description: A equine penis. Huge for a human.
LanguageData.HorseVagina.label: equine vagina
LanguageData.HorseVagina.description: A equine vagina. Gaping vagina just begs Studs to plow it.
LanguageData.CatPenis.label: feline penis
LanguageData.CatPenis.description: A feline penis. Long, thin and barbed.
LanguageData.CatVagina.label: feline vagina
LanguageData.CatVagina.description: A feline vagina. Long and thin vagina with clitoris inside, perfect for barbed feline cocks.
LanguageData.DogPenis.label: canine penis
LanguageData.DogPenis.description: A canine penis. Thick and knotted.
LanguageData.DogVagina.label: canine vagina
LanguageData.DogVagina.description: A canine vagina. Has enough strength to keep cock inside for 20 minutes.
LanguageData.DragonPenis.label: dragon penis
LanguageData.DragonPenis.description: A dragon penis. Thick and HARD.

LanguageData.DragonVagina.description: A dragon vagina. It's gaping, probably good for laying eggs.
LanguageData.RaccoonPenis.label: procyonine penis
LanguageData.RaccoonPenis.description: A procyonine penis. Impressive length, but very thin and inflexible.
LanguageData.HemiPenis.label: hemipenis
LanguageData.HemiPenis.description: A reptilian hemipenis. Two knobbly shafts with flexible barbs.
LanguageData.CrocodilianPenis.label: crocodilian penis
LanguageData.CrocodilianPenis.description: A crocodilian penis. Very rigid and has a thick bulbous base, but otherwise similar to a humanoid penis.
LanguageData.NarrowVagina.label: narrow vagina
LanguageData.NarrowVagina.description: A narrow vagina. A deep, but particularly thin vagina.
LanguageData.NeedlePenis.label: needle-like penis
LanguageData.NeedlePenis.description: A needle-like penis. A rather long, but exceptionally thin penis.
LanguageData.RodentVagina.label: rodent vagina
LanguageData.RodentVagina.description: A rodent vagina. A vagina barely even large enough to fit a human finger.
LanguageData.RodentPenis.label: rodent penis
LanguageData.RodentPenis.description: A rodent penis. A truly tiny penis, built for the bare minimum of function.
LanguageData.CloacalPenis.label: cloacal penis
LanguageData.CloacalPenis.description: A cloacal penis. A male sex organ tucked away inside a slit.
LanguageData.CloacalVagina.label: cloacal vagina
LanguageData.CloacalVagina.description: A cloacal vagina. A female, egg-laying sex organ.
LanguageData.UdderBreasts.label: udder
LanguageData.UdderBreasts.description: Large udder, possibly from muffalo or some similar animal. May be attached to humanoids for literal cowgirl look.
LanguageData.CloacalAnus.label: cloacal anus
LanguageData.CloacalAnus.description: A cloacal anus. An anus hidden within a common port for the reproductive organs, known as a cloaca.
